completionConfig.label: gpt-4
completionConfig.chatSystemMessage: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information.

variables.value: David, I'm going to work on your project tomorrow

output.prompt:
Rewrite the text between triple backticks into a business mail. Use a professional tone, be clar and concise.
Sign the mail as AI Assistant.

Text: ```David, I'm going to work on your project tomorrow```
output.result:
Subject: Upcoming Project Work Schedule

Dear David,

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to inform you that I have scheduled to commence work on your project tomorrow. 

Should you have any questions or need further clarification, please do not hesitate to contact me. 

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Best Regards,

AI Assistant
